name: R5-LocationMode-R4-LocationMode
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 LocationMode into a FHIR R4 LocationMode

element.display: The Location resource represents a specific instance of a location (e.g. Operating Theatre 1A).

target.display: The Location resource represents a specific instance of a location (e.g. Operating Theatre 1A).

element.display: The Location represents a class of locations (e.g. Any Operating Theatre) although this class of locations could be constrained within a specific boundary (such as organization, or parent location, address etc.).

target.display: The Location represents a class of locations (e.g. Any Operating Theatre) although this class of locations could be constrained within a specific boundary (such as organization, or parent location, address etc.).
